Class Birthday

java.lang.Object
cmpt213.assignment.importantdaystracker.webappserver.model.ImportantDay
cmpt213.assignment.importantdaystracker.webappserver.model.Birthday
All Implemented Interfaces:
Comparable<ImportantDay>
public class Birthday extends ImportantDay
Class that stores a birthday with its name, date, description, frequency, and person's name.
